title: Youngest Scion of the Mages
alternative_titles: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan
The Youngest Son of Magical Master
summary: Youngest Scion of the Mages Manhwa It was a ridiculous piece of fiction, one that I’d be ashamed to call a novel. Yet, that was exactly what I transmigrated into. Larsen Mayton. I became that supporting character, a wretched scoundrel who got purged at the age of 17. Now, as the writer and creator, I shall reshape the world of the character Larsen Mayton. Alternative Names: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan, Magician’s youngest son, The Youngest Son of Magical Master, Magical Master Youngest Son, 마법명가 막내아들
